Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I have been using for about two months an HP 2000-2d22dx which is of the same product line as this HP 2000-2d89nr here on Amazon. There is good non-touch-screen performance and an excellent touchpad. The maximum sound volume, though, is markedly low in the model I have.  In both this one now on Amazon and mine there is no number pad, just a large keyboard in the style of a 14 inch laptop.  Mine and this one have bright glossy screens and glossy black finishes for the case, both of which I like a lot. My model has plain Windows 8, and this one does too.  I like mine a lot aesthetically and functionally and I also guess I like Windows 8 about as much as I might like Windows 8.1.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 3230M 2.6 GHz
4 GB
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8, 4.5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: HP 2000-2d89nr 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black Licorice)
